column4: anyone care to list some reasons for switching from gentoo to ubuntu? after a little over a year of being a gentoo user, i'm kind of tired of the compile times and such. what does everyone like about ubuntu? :\
eh, that sounds good enough for me :)
maybe i'll try it in vmware first, and if i like it i'll just go with it
i mean, this is a support channel, but I've naught had a problem, well, one that wasn't my own stupidity ;)
oh, it is a support channel. i'm kind of used to chatting in distrobution channels :P anyways i'll  give it a try. thanks and bye!
